attributes.action: Educate the decision makers about Fibromyalgia and likewise ilnesses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It would appear that Decision makers within the Disability and carers are not medically trained and basically are pen pushers, We would like the government to educate and make them aware of ilnesses like fibromyalgia and like wise ilnessess ME  and also CFS
To live with these ilnessess are bad enough without un-educated people making decisions based on software or books alone

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
